articles.author: Paayal Zaveri
articles.title: Microsoft should pay whatever it costs to replace Google on Samsung phones - Business Insider
articles.description: The threat to Google's search dominance from Microsoft and OpenAI got more real, as Samsung is reportedly thinking about replacing Google with Bing on its phones.
articles.content:
Microsoft's partnership with OpenAI, the creator of the viral success that is the ChatGPT chatbot, presents the biggest threat yet to Google's stranglehold on the web search market.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack Gets 3 More Genesis Games - ComingSoon.net
articles.description: Nintendo has added the next batch of Sega Genesis games to its Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack, which includes three platformers.
articles.content: Nintendo has gradually been adding more Genesis games to its Nintendo Switch Online Expansion Pack library every few months. And the company just dropped the first few Genesis games of the year by ad… [+578 chars]
